::FireBlade::
FireBlade opened his private link to SwitchBlade.
"hye bud...i need you to do some repairs on me and forge me a new 
blade."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> Megatron turned his attention to Razorclaw, "Shockwave, are you 
sure?" 
> he asked. He hoped his loyal second in command was indeed there.
> 
> "We have no time to waste. Fireblade, repair yourself. Razorclaw, 
help 
> your Predacon comerades into CR chambers, Stunticons transform, and 
> head towards the CF, Cyclonus Scourge, follow them, Cyclonus I will 
> ride with you". He then turned to Autofire, "Autofire, are you in 
good 
> enough shape to head to these coordinates?" He asked.
